mapper.select: SELECT CARD_NO AS cardNo, CARD_NAME AS cardName, CARD_URL AS cardUrl, CARD_SLOGAN AS cardSlogan, CARD_TYPE AS cardType, CARD_BRAND AS cardBrand, VIEW_COUNT AS viewCount, ANNUAL_FEE AS annualFee FROM CARD WHERE CARD_STATUS = '게시중' ORDER BY CARD_NO
SELECT CARD_TYPE FROM CARD WHERE CARD_NO = #{cardNo}

SELECT CARD_NO AS cardNo, CARD_NAME AS cardName, CARD_URL AS cardUrl, CARD_SLOGAN AS cardSlogan, CARD_TYPE AS cardType, CARD_BRAND AS cardBrand, VIEW_COUNT AS viewCount, ANNUAL_FEE AS annualFee, SERVICE AS service, S_SERVICE AS sService FROM CARD
CARD_STATUS = '게시중'
AND ( LOWER(CARD_NAME) LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', LOWER(#{keyword})), '%') OR LOWER(SERVICE) LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', LOWER(#{keyword})), '%') OR LOWER(S_SERVICE) LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', LOWER(#{keyword})), '%') OR LOWER(CARD_TYPE) LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', LOWER(#{keyword})), '%') )
AND CARD_TYPE = #{type}
AND (
LOWER(SERVICE) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{tg}) || '%' OR LOWER(S_SERVICE) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{tg}) || '%'
)
ORDER BY CARD_NO
SELECT CARD_NO, CARD_NAME, CARD_SLOGAN, CARD_URL, POPULAR_IMG_URL, VIEW_COUNT FROM CARD ORDER BY VIEW_COUNT DESC FETCH FIRST 6 ROWS ONLY

SELECT CARD_NO, CARD_NAME, CARD_TYPE, CARD_BRAND, VIEW_COUNT, ANNUAL_FEE, ISSUEDTO, SERVICE, S_SERVICE, CARD_STATUS, CARD_URL, CARD_ISSUEDATE, CARD_DUEDATE, CARD_SLOGAN, CARD_NOTICE, REG_DATE, EDIT_DATE FROM CARD WHERE CARD_STATUS = '게시중' ORDER BY VIEW_COUNT DESC, EDIT_DATE DESC NULLS LAST FETCH FIRST 3 ROWS ONLY
